name: Cataclysm Restored (FULL)
description:
- Intended to return the feel of CDDA 0.C era while retaining modern upgrades.
- Portal storms are disabled, acid rain makes a return.
- Breathability of clothing, and max item length of storage items greatly increased.
- Removed welding rod requirements, disassembling sheets provide more cotton sheets.
- ANBC and AEP suits can be dropped by Hazmat Zombies again.
- Chicken Walker and Tank Drone can spawn again.
- Body pillows update for the Undead People tileset.

- See extended description in README.md.
- This mod contains the FULL changeset of Cataclysm Restored, partial spins offs may be available.
